abstract: In keeping with their combative client’s own style, President Trump’s lawyers plan to insist he did nothing wrong,
lead_paragraph: In keeping with their combative client’s own style, President Trump’s lawyers plan not only to insist he did nothing wrong, but also to go after his accusers in unrelenting terms, painting them as partisans not prosecutors. The lawyers hope to turn the tables on the Democrats by hurling back at them some of the same allegations they have made against their client. By their account, the Democrats are the ones who are corrupt liars who sought foreign help and are now abusing their power to steal an election.
